caption.text: Description of MRI parameters evaluated in this study.

cell.text:
Represents topological parameters expected to increase
versus
those expected to decrease, with erosion cause by osteoclastic resorption. A higher index is consistent with greater trabecular deterioration (
Rajapakse et al., 2014
).
Represents the ratio of bone volume to total volume in the region of interest.
Represents mean number of trabecular per unit length
Represents the bone marrow space between trabeculae
Main component of FEA and a marker of bone mechanical competence

statement.text: Cortical thickness (CTh) (mm) description is that Indicates the plate (surface) to rod (curve) ratio of the trabeculae. A higher ratio is a marker of greater trabecular network integrity ( ).
Cortical thickness (CTh) (mm) description is that Represents mean cortical bone thickness.
Elastic modulus (GPa) description is that Main component of FEA and a marker of bone mechanical competence.
Erosion index (EI) description is that Represents the bone martr space between trabeculae.
In table they have 8 kinds of MRI Parameter.

Segmentation was determined by delineating the periosteal and endosteal boundaries of the bone with an operator-guided semi-automatic algorithm using custom-built software ( Rajapakse et al., 2012 ) and standard microarchitecture parameters were derived for trabecular and cortical bone.
Table 1 outlines MRI parameters evaluated in this study.

caption.text: Spearman correlations (r) between trabecular and cortical microarchitecture parameters (determined by MRI) and bone turnover markers.

legend.text: Abbreviations: S/C, surface to curve ratio; EI, erosion index; BV/TV (%), trabecular bone volume; TbTh (mm), trabecular thickness; TbN (1/mm), trabecular number; TbS (mm), trabecular separation; CTh (mm), cortical thickness.

statement.text: ALP value for both BV/TV (%) and TbTh (mm) is 0.5.
ALP value for both BV/TV (%) and TbTh (mm) is 0.8.
Both ALP and PTH contains negative values for EI and TbS (mm).
The highest PTH value is -0.22 of CTh (mm).
There are 9 types of different MRI parameter.
